content.Description: An array of table names to extract from.
The amount of records to sample when inferring the schema.
A mapping of table name to the scan kwargs that should be used to override the default when querying that table.
The access key for your AWS account.
The secret key for your AWS account.
The session key for your AWS account. This is only needed when you are using temporary credentials.
The AWS credentials profile name to use. The profile must be configured and accessible.
The default AWS region name (e.g. us-east-1)
The complete URL to use for the constructed client.
Whether to retrieve aws credentials from environment variables.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
